consent.title: Consent Required
consent.body: Minimon Lab keeps your decks on your device while relying on Netlify for hosting and a private API in France.
consent.pointDevice: All Minimon data and state stay stored on your local device.
consent.pointHosting: The interface is served through Netlify and the API runs on a private server in France.
consent.pointNoCollection: We never collect or persist any data (not even IPs or request logs), but we cannot guarantee what Netlify records on their side.
consent.pointAcceptance: Continuing means you accept interacting with our API and the Netlify hosting environment.

guide.title: Strategic Guide
guide.paragraph1: Spin up the generator, chase rarity spikes, and build momentum: roll until you land a headliner, keep two S-tier anchors in your deck, then let agile B/C supporters fill the gaps. Duplicate commons? Flip them fast for tokens and pour that fuel back into fresh summons because velocity beats hoarding.
guide.paragraph2: Before every big push, glance at your Minidek score and token stash: the tokens you’re still holding will become a matching number of points when you archive, so bank a hot streak to the Hall of Fame when the curve peaks then dive back in for the next meta shift. Quick flips (reselling a fresh Minimon in under 5 seconds while it still shows “New!”) add extra score, while repeating the same rarity lowers the refund slightly to keep the market fresh. Treat every session like a seasonal ladder-learn, iterate, and keep the lab lights on.
guide.paragraph3: Feeling unstoppable? Smash “Start New Game”, craft your dream lineup, then flood social networks with your best Minimon decks while quoting “P2Enjoy” so the whole community knows who’s setting the pace. When you bank a hot streak, the Hall of Fame awards badges (Curator, Flipper, Risk-taker, Speedy gonzales) that show the story behind the run. Finish a run in under 15 seconds to earn the Speedy gonzales badge and let the Hall know you blitzed the loop.
guide.badgeCurator: Curator: keep more than twice as many Minimon as you resell.
guide.badgeFlipper: Flipper: resell at least as many as you keep and stay liquid.
guide.badgeRisk: Risk-taker: balance keeping and flipping for a hybrid run.
guide.badgeBrave: Brave run: sell an S or S+ while staying aggressive.
guide.badgeNoBrainer: No brainer: quick-flip three Minimon within their 5s window.
guide.badgeNoPlayer: No player: archive without reselling a single Minimon.
guide.badgeSpeedy: Speedy gonzales: archive a run in less than 15 seconds to show off the lightning pace.
